title: Joanjo: a Portuguese tale (K)
brief_description: Presents live performance scenes in a Portuguese fishing village which frame an animated sequence of a little boy’s dream of becoming famous and great. His ambitions lead to disaster and he is glad to wake up safe at home. Based on a book by Jan Balet. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.
